list.header: To my best friend and love
list.body: I'm writing this to tell you some of the things I love about you (It wouldn't be possible for me to list them all). I hope this helps you feel like you are worth loving, and that yours is the only love I want.
Your smile not only lights up the room, but lights up my life.
Your lips always leave a taste my heart can't forget.
There are few sounds that carry the same amount and variety of feeling to my heart as does your laugh.
Your body is beautiful, I love your hips most of all.

list.header: I love your relationship with our families
list.body: I can't wait to see the relationship you have with ours.
You are so driven to accomplish anything and everything that you desire. You never cease to amaze me with everything that you are accomplishing.
You put up with my mistakes. Need I say more?

list.header: I love that you go to therapy
list.body: You are incredibly strong and willing to make hard decisions to work on making yourself the best you can be.

list.header: I love that you care for my health
list.body: It really means a lot to me that you have my best interest in mind.

list.header: I love that you are thoughtful
list.body: It made me so happy when you went out to dinner and asked if I wanted you to bring me anything.

list.header: I love that you are willing to help me clean
list.body: This includes the house, doing laundry, the dishes, etc.

list.header: I love that you are willing to play videogames with me
list.body: There isn't much better than my favorite hobby with my favorite person.

list.header: I love that you are encouraging
list.body: You encourage me to do things at work that I am afraid to do.

list.header: I love that you are supportive
list.body: You support me through my struggles, the decisions I make, and I know you will always have my back.

list.header: I love that you are kind
list.body: You are kind to everyone around you. You have students and dance moms that adore you. I do too.
You know exactly how to make me feel amazing, and I can't get enough.

list.header: I love how you love me
list.body: You love me when I struggle to love myself. I am grateful every day to have met you, and to be able to call you mine.
